meanings.definition: To draw or trace over again
meanings.sent1: She is redrawing the picture to make it neater.
meanings.sent2: The artist is redrawing the outline of the flower.
meanings.sent3: Redrawing the map with crayons made it look like a child's creation.
meanings.sent4: The teacher is redrawing the boundaries of the classroom rules.
meanings.sent5: After redrawing the lines, the artwork came to life with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: To revise or update a drawing or plan
meanings.sent1: He is redrawing the blueprint to include the new changes.
meanings.sent2: The architect is redrawing the floor plan to accommodate more rooms.
meanings.sent3: Redrawing the treasure map with silly symbols confused the pirates.
meanings.sent4: The author is redrawing the plot of the story to add a surprising twist.
meanings.sent5: By redrawing the design, the engineer found a more efficient solution.
